Title: Prohibits ear clipping and tail docking of dogs unless deemed medically necessary to protect the life or health of the dog
Summary: Prohibits ear clipping and tail docking of dogs unless deemed medically necessary to protect the life or health of the dog.
LawCode: Amd ยง365, add ยง365-a, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to prohibiting ear clipping and tail docking of dogs unless deemed medically necessary to protect the life or health of the dog
